thread.title_full: Best location - Review of Novotel Beijing Peace, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: venturacruiser
title: Best location
text:
We recently stayed in this hotel for two nights during a cruise. The location is excellent with lots of good restaurants and shopping within easy walking distance. The rooms were spacious and clean. The only thing that we didn't like was the low powered light bulbs. The room was dark even with the lights turned on.
We did have some difficulty understanding the concierge and having him understand us.
Breakfast was great with lots of choices! We did some shopping in the hotel gift shop.
We would definitely stay here again.
